revision.text:
Shiny Pokémon can be obtained in a number of different ways, each with their own odds. As of version 0.6.8, the only ways to augment the chances of encountering shinies are to equip the [[Shiny Charm]] or have [[Starf]] Berries growing in the [[Farm]] (at full ripeness, each Starf plant gives a 1.5% boost).
